section.p: Packager brings the capability to create in a click a package to be deployed on one or many environments.

The packager is a separate project in your workspace with a specific nature. Thanks to dependencies defined in its pom.xml file, it assembles in a single package:
All data files and Basic files it compiles from a *-data-code project.
All versions (*.version) and enquiries (*.enquiry) from *-models project.
The resulting artifact the packager creates is a TAR for TAFC and a JAR for TAFJ. It can then be deployed on T24 environment using T24 delivered installers.
This Design Studio feature can be launched from maven, out of the Eclipse IDE, providing industrial way of installing a T24 package.
